methodology: Novel predictions (not in ground truth) validated against literature search

evidence.summary: Clinical trial showed pitavastatin + methotrexate superior to methotrexate alone
evidence.mechanism: Higher anti-inflammatory and immunomodulating effects than other statins via ERK/AP-1 pathway suppression
evidence.meta_analysis: 15 RCTs show statins significantly reduce DAS28, ESR, CRP, tender joints in RA
evidence.key_finding: Pitavastatin shows stronger inhibition of IL-2, IFN-γ, IL-6, TNF-α than atorvastatin or rosuvastatin

validated_predictions.actionability: HIGH - Could be added to RA treatment guidelines as adjunct therapy

evidence.summary: ERβ activation positively correlated with mucosal healing in UC patients
evidence.mechanism: Estrogen receptor beta promotes colonic epithelial healing via autophagy modulation
evidence.key_finding: ERβ agonist + 5-aminosalicylic acid combination enhanced amelioration in mouse colitis
evidence.caveat: HRT may increase UC risk in some populations - needs careful dosing

validated_predictions.actionability: MEDIUM - Promising but risk/benefit needs clarification

evidence.summary: Approved for pulmonary arterial hypertension; causes systemic vasodilation
evidence.mechanism: Direct vasodilator of both pulmonary AND systemic arterial beds
evidence.key_finding: Systemic hypotension is documented effect - could be therapeutic
evidence.caveat: Currently indicated for PAH only; systemic use would be repurposing

validated_predictions.actionability: MEDIUM - Already approved drug with known systemic effects

evidence.summary: No clinical evidence found; would be truly novel repurposing
evidence.mechanism: Known immunomodulatory effects beyond cancer therapy
evidence.key_finding: Strong target overlap (31 genes) suggests biological plausibility
evidence.caveat: Significant toxicity concerns for chronic autoimmune use

validated_predictions.actionability: LOW - Would need preclinical validation first

evidence.summary: No evidence of antidiabetic effects; chemotherapy drug
evidence.mechanism: Model likely detecting metabolic pathway overlaps without therapeutic relevance
evidence.key_finding: Anthracyclines have cardiotoxicity - diabetes is a risk factor, not treatment target

evidence.summary: Topical corticosteroids are already first-line psoriasis treatment
evidence.note: May not be in ground truth due to data capture issues, not true novelty

evidence.summary: RCT with 81 patients showed TDL (thalidomide-dex-lovastatin) superior to TD (thalidomide-dex)
evidence.mechanism: HMG-CoA reductase inhibition exhibits antineoplastic and proapoptotic properties in myeloma cells
evidence.key_finding: Prolongation of overall survival AND progression-free survival in TDL group vs TD group
evidence.apoptosis: Higher apoptosis rates at 24h and 48h (p < 0.001, Friedman ANOVA)
evidence.safety: Safe and well tolerated, side effects comparable in both groups

validated_predictions.actionability: HIGH - Could be added to myeloma treatment protocols as adjunct to thalidomide/dex

evidence.summary: Not FDA-approved for MS but widely used off-label with strong clinical evidence
evidence.clinical_trials: Phase II trials HERMES (RRMS) and OLYMPUS (PPMS) demonstrated efficacy
evidence.who_recognition: WHO listed rituximab as essential medicine for MS in July 2023
evidence.mechanism: Anti-CD20 B-cell depletion, same mechanism as FDA-approved ocrelizumab
evidence.advocacy: ICER (Feb 2023) called on payers to remove barriers to rituximab coverage for MS

validated_predictions.actionability: HIGH - Already in clinical use, formal FDA approval advocacy ongoing

evidence.summary: Preclinical evidence shows cardioprotective effects via sGC activation and cGMP signaling
evidence.mechanism: PPARα activation + soluble guanylate cyclase (sGC) activating effects
evidence.preclinical: Improved LV contractility, active relaxation, coronary blood flow in rat heart transplant model
evidence.key_finding: Reduced nitro-oxidative stress and apoptosis, improved cGMP signalling
evidence.caveat: No dedicated HF-specific RCTs identified; evidence is preclinical

validated_predictions.actionability: MEDIUM - Warrants clinical investigation in heart failure patients

top_actionable_predictions.recommendation: Add to myeloma treatment protocols as adjunct to thalidomide/dexamethasone
Already used off-label; advocate for formal FDA approval or coverage parity
top_actionable_predictions.evidence_level: Phase II Trials + WHO Essential Medicine

top_actionable_predictions.recommendation: Add to RA treatment guidelines as adjunct to methotrexate
Meta-analysis of 15 RCTs supports use for anti-inflammatory effects
Warrants clinical investigation based on preclinical cardioprotective evidence
Promising combination with 5-ASA; needs clinical trial

false_positive_patterns_identified.reason: Target overlap reflects oncogenic pathways shared with metabolism, not therapeutic relevance

false_positive_patterns_identified.pattern: Drugs already used for indication but missing from ground truth
false_positive_patterns_identified.reason: Data completeness issue, not model error

summary.precision_estimate: 67% for truly novel predictions with literature validation
